title: Hero Inside
synopsis:
Heroes can pop out of their comic books when summoned in this comedic action-adventure.

The cartoonist Scott mysteriously disappears, leaving behind 100 volumes of superhero comic books that spread throughout San Francisco. The protagonist, Mike, stumbles upon "Crying Man" and ends up summoning the superhero from the book, forever changing his life. But it's not just Mike, but many people begin to summon superheroes from these comic books, leading to a series of events unfolding throughout San Francisco.
